name: nextjsonazure
description: Examples on adding nextjs on azure

scripts.deploy-jss-azure-functions: npx rimraf packages/jss-nextjs-app/node_modules && npx rimraf packages/jss-nextjs-app/.next && npx ncp packages/jss-nextjs-app packages/jss-nextjs-app-azure-functions/jss-nextjs-app && cd packages/jss-nextjs-app-azure-functions/jss-nextjs-app && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && func azure functionapp publish funcjssnextjsonazure  --javascript --nozip --verbose &&  npx rimraf jss-nextjs-app

author: Erwin Smit
